means: 创造性，创造力，创作能力

sentence.Network_en: How can faculty improve their teaching so as to encourage creativity?
sentence.Network_cn: 教师们如何才能改进教学以激发创造性呢？

sentence.Network_en: Her natural creativity and artistic talent make her home a real showstopper.
sentence.Network_cn: 她天生的创造力和艺术天赋让她的家不同凡响，令人叹服。

sentence.Network_en: I regard creativity both as a gift and as a skill.
sentence.Network_cn: 我认为创造力既是一种天赋也是一种技巧。

创新是企业家精神的灵魂。熊彼特关于企业家是从事“创造性破坏（creative destruction）”的创新者观点，凸显了企业家精神的实质和特征。一个企业最大的隐患，就是创新精神的消亡。一个企业，要么.

entry.tran: (尤指在艺术方面)有创造力的，有想象力的
entry.def: A creative person has the ability to invent and develop original ideas, especially in the arts.

example.ex: Like so many creative people he was never satisfied.
example.tran: 像许多富于创造力的人一样，他从不满足。
她显而易见的创作才能

entry.def: Creative activities involve the inventing and making of new kinds of things.
If you use something in a creative way, you use it in a new way that produces interesting and unusual results.

example.tran: 他对词语的创造性运用

entry.def: A creative is someone whose job is to be creative, especially someone who creates advertisements.

example.ex: Along with scores of other advertising creatives, he will be taking part in an exhibition at the Saatchi gallery.
example.tran: 他将和许多广告创意人员一起参加在萨奇画廊举行的画展。

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表名词,由-ive+-ity组成,"由……能力或特性"

stems_affixes.word_buile: conduct传导+ivity由……能力或特性→n.传导性,传导率
create创造+ivity由……能力或特性→n.创造力;独创性

stems_affixes.value_cn: 相对性,相关性,[物]相对论
stems_affixes.word_buile: relate使联系,发生关系+ivity由……能力或特性→n.相对性,相关性,[物]相对论
resist抵抗,反抗,抗,忍得住+ivity由……能力或特性→n.抵抗力,电阻系数
select选择+ivity由……能力或特性→n.选择性

Sentence.sentence: Well, to pick up where we left off last time, I believe we agreed that creativity is a mysterious idea.
Is creativity a natural gift like good looks, or is it something that can be acquired like knowledge
The creative process has always been accepted as the source of all important work in the arts, but we should not think the creativity plays a role only in the arts.
The Uses of Difficulty The brain likes a challenge—and putting a few obstacles in its way may well boost its creativity

Precisely because they were working with old-fashioned machines, George Martin and his team of engineers were forced to apply every ounce of their creativity to solve the problems posed to them by Lennon and McCartney

means.word_mean: 创造性，创造力；创作能力

sentences.en: the highest expression of human creativity
sentences.cn: 人类创造力的最高表现

sentences.en: A good teacher can encourage artistic creativity.
sentences.cn: 好的老师能够激励艺术创造力。

sentences.en: There is limited scope for creativity in my job.
sentences.cn: 我的工作中发挥创造力的空间有限。

sentences.en: She got an unusually low score for creativity.
sentences.cn: 在创造力方面，她得了异乎寻常的低分。

sentences.en: The association of ideas in original ways is the key to creativity.
sentences.cn: 将概念以独特的方式进行联想是产生独创性的关键。
